sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Newes from Rome, Spaine, Palermo, Geneuæ and France With the miserable state of the citty of Paris, and the late yeelding vppe of sundrie towns of great strength, vnto the king. Translated out of Italian and French into English.
8 leaves : ill.
Printed [by J. Wolfe?] for Thomas Nelson, and are to be sold by William Wright, London : 1590.
Printer's name suggested by STC. Only leaves 2-3 are foliated. Partly in verse. Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral Library.
=======

8 leaves : ill.
Printed [by J. Wolfe?] for Thomas Nelson, and are to be sold by William Wright, London : 1590.
Printer's name suggested by STC. Only leaves 2-3 are foliated. Partly in verse. Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral Library.
